name: Hack 'N Dance
description:
The year is 3259, after the robot revolution was a success and all humans have been terminated, dancing has been declared illegal. But rules.... are meant to be broken.

"Hack 'N Dance" is a Rhythm/melodic hack & slash, where all your attacks are dance move's.

The combat/dancing is joinend together with music.

You will deal great damage if you perofrm the right dance-moves/attacks on the right musical accents!

the controlls are:

WASD - move

Space - jump

Left mouse button - forward attack

Right mouse button - backward attack

Scrolll up (mouse wheel) - 180 forward attack

Scroll down (mouse wheel) - 360 attack

Have fun! ;)
